description:
This technical sun shirt is designed for people who like to spend the summer with their feet in the water. An antimicrobial finish eliminates odours so you can travel light on those long expeditions to the Bonaventure River campgrounds.

  • Made of 90% quick-drying recycled polyester with spandex for stretch
  • Perforated underarm panels and vented back for enhanced breathability
  • 2 zippered chest pockets for essentials
  • Articulated elbows for freedom of movement
  • Roll-up sleeves with adjustable cuffs adds weather versatility
  • Microfibre cleaning cloth for sunglasses and lenses
  • Hidden accessory loop for tool attachment
  • SilverClear® antimicrobial treatment keeps odours at bay
  • UPF 50+ for protection against UV rays
  • OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabric adds confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
name: Hooke Valley Sun Shirt - Men's
